actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

official_title: To extend and modify the temporary reduction of duty on Sulfentrazone.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to increase, through December 31, 2011, the duty on N-[2,4-dichloro-5-[4-(difluoromethyl)-4,5-dihydro-3-methyl-5-oxo-1H-1,2,4-triazol-1-yl]phenyl]methanesulfonamide (Sulfentrazone) (CAS No. 122836-35-5) and any formulations containing such compound.

titles.title: To extend and modify the temporary reduction of duty on Sulfentrazone.
